divs: Sighting DetailsIn the fall of 1987 we got a call from a realtor to come up and look a house in clay,ny a suburb of syracuse. we left staten island at 6:30pm,we being my wife and 2 very young daughters. we have made the drive many times so we know the trip is only 3 and a half hrs. that night we had torrential rains.so we proceeded on the nj turnpike north and then to 17 west which will take us to the shawungunk mts.well before we exited the turnpike i stopped at a rest stop and bought coffee and snacks for the girls.we turned on to 17w, thats when my wife looked up and said "it looks like we were driving of the edge of the earth",when she said that i turned to look at her when then turned to look at the road and it was daylight and we were 33 miles from syracuse.iwoke up my wife and she yelled nervously "what happened" all i could say is i dont know. and i dont remember the trip here.i cant remember the trip here. i had to physically awaken my two girls.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Syracuse
There were no other sightings in Syracuse on or around September 30th 1987
